posts.post_content:
Posted By: David
Have to sell my Ty cobb bat off shouler psa 4.  This is a really nice card, asking $1850 obo.  I would prefer using paypal, but willing to take other payments.  If you use paypal add 3% all other payment methods must allow time for payment to process, insurance will be covered by me.  Email me at david_62@hotmail.com if interested.


David
